By  Jennifer HutchinsOctober  

Volleyball momentum usually swings like a pendulumsometimes its up and sometimes down PERIOD

Unfortunately NIU has recently seen the downside of the swing against a tough University of IllinoisChicago squad Tuesday PERIOD This weekend the Huskies look to swing their way back to the top against WisconsinGreen Bay PERIOD

If game predictions were made in terms of records the Huskies certainly have the advantage PERIOD NIU is  for the season with a  showing in the North Star Conference PERIOD The Phoenix however are having a rough year PERIOD With a  record UWGB remains winless in the NSC at  PERIOD UWGB hasnt had much luck against the Huskies in the past with NIU leading the series at  PERIOD

Although that appears to be good news for NIU the Huskies are actually struggling to overcome a pair of injuries PERIOD According to head volleyball coach Pete Waite senior Julie KreilingZinke will most likely be out for another week due to an ankle injury she received in the match against UIC PERIOD To make matters worse freshman Kori Schauer also is out with a persistent ankle injury PERIOD She hopes to be back to practice Friday and possibly see playing time against UWGB PERIOD

The Huskies will be staying home to host the Phoenix at the Chick Evans Field House Saturday PERIOD Gametime is scheduled for  p.m PERIOD
